alert.note: Alert for Floyd; Johnson; Magoffin; Morgan; Wolfe (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 16 at 4:27PM EDT until May 16 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in JACKSON KY has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Morgan County in southeastern Kentucky... Southwestern Johnson County in northeastern Kentucky... Northwestern Floyd County in southeastern Kentucky... Magoffin County in southeastern Kentucky... East central Wolfe County in southeastern Kentucky... * Until 500 PM EDT. * At 427 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Belknap, or 12 miles west of Salyersville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Epson around 435 PM EDT. Ova around 440 PM EDT. Gullett around 445 PM EDT. Lakesville around 450 PM EDT. Salyersville around 455 PM EDT. Bradley around 500 PM EDT. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
